context:
High-level Goal: Compare the price of the Uniqlo "Seamless Down Parka" across major US retailers (Uniqlo vs Amazon vs Nordstrom vs eBay)
Comparison Target: Seamless Down Parka (Uniqlo)
Compare by: price

Comparison info gathered so far:
  - www.uniqlo.com: not found yet (search not performed)

final_comparison.final_answer: No best option — insufficient price data (no prices found for Seamless Down Parka)
final_comparison.reasoning: I cannot determine the best option because no price data was gathered for the Seamless Down Parka from any retailer. The only site noted was Uniqlo (search not performed / not found yet); Amazon, Nordstrom, and eBay prices were not provided. Without at least one confirmed price per retailer, a price-based comparison is not possible. Next steps to produce a valid comparison: perform searches on Uniqlo, Amazon, Nordstrom, and eBay for the exact product and record the current listed prices (including shipping/taxes if applicable) and any differences in model/size/color that affect price.
